content:
Sure, here are 5 guest posting websites for the niche of fresh cut fruit subscription based in Mumbai:

| # | Broad Topics | Website | Email | Tip |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Food, Health, Nutrition | Pinkvilla | [editorial@pinkvilla.com](mailto:editorial@pinkvilla.com) | Focus on the health benefits of fresh cut fruit and their role in a balanced diet |
| 2 | Food, Lifestyle | Mumbai Foodie | [mumbaifoodie@gmail.com](mailto:mumbaifoodie@gmail.com) | Highlight the convenience and variety offered by a fresh cut fruit subscription service |
| 3 | Food, Recipes, Restaurants | Burrp! | [editorial@burrp.com](mailto:editorial@burrp.com) | Write about recipes featuring fresh cut fruit or restaurants in Mumbai offering fruit-centric dishes |
| 4 | Health, Fitness, Lifestyle | Femina | [femina@wwm.co.in](mailto:femina@wwm.co.in) | Discuss the ways in which fresh cut fruit can contribute to an active and healthy lifestyle |
| 5 | Food, Recipes, Health | Archana's Kitchen | [support@archanaskitchen.com](mailto:support@archanaskitchen.com) | Share healthy fruit-based recipes or talk about the nutritional benefits of different types of fruit |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
